title: SeeQi Â· Intelligent Eastern Wellness
mission: Mission: Bring the wisdom of Traditional Chinese Medicine to the world through data-driven, personalized experiences.
vision: Vision: Become the trusted platform for next-generation Eastern constitution insights.
intro: Our team blends expertise from TCM practitioners, AI engineers, and data scientists, reimagining how Eastern wellness is delivered.
By analyzing multi-modal signals such as palm and tongue imagery, our proprietary models identify constitution patterns and offer guidance aligned with the 24 solar terms.
We believe technology can illuminate the timeless wisdom of the East for a modern lifestyle.

items.label: Trusted Expertise
items.description: Co-developed with leading TCM experts, continually validated with clinical insights.

items.label: User First
items.description: We protect privacy and data security, crafting a warm, empathetic experience.

items.label: Eastern Innovation
items.description: Eastern philosophy inspires tailored wellness solutions for contemporary life.
